thread.title: Semble's Nonprofit Debt Assessment is Proving Invaluable
thread.title_full: Semble's Nonprofit Debt Assessment is Proving Invaluable - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Semble's Nonprofit Debt Assessment is Proving Invaluable
text:
Semble
BELLEVUE, Wash. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Effectively lowering the interest costs on financing helps nonprofit organizations meet the surging demands for their services within the community. Realizing every nonprofit is unique, Semble has begun to offer initial financing assessments with no obligations and at no cost. When asked about this new approach, Semble President Chris Walcott shared, "Our goal is to provide value to nonprofits and churches. The assessment gives direction on how to successfully address their loan needs while demonstrating that our involvement makes a difference." By reviewing necessary information, Semble is able to evaluate the nonprofits financing need and provide a thorough, detailed strategy to meet that need.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278349LOGO
Semble is an expert financial solutions provider specializing in low cost loans for nonprofit organizations. Our approach combines crowdfunding and bank financing uniquely tailored to meet nonprofit loan needs for refinancing debt, working capital, or financing new facilities. Since 2007, Semble has helped nonprofits significantly reduce loan payments and increase donor support and retention as a way to reclaim precious resources for missional impact.
For more information about Semble, go to www.semble.com or contact a member of the Semble team at info@semble.com .
Contact:
Chris Walcott
425-214-5871
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sembles-nonprofit-debt-assessment-is-proving-invaluable-300162220.html
